thread.title: LateRooms.com rolls out new corporate travel service
thread.title_full: LateRooms.com rolls out new corporate travel service

title: LateRooms.com rolls out new corporate travel service
text:
Save 
Online travel agent LateRooms.com has taken its first steps towards setting up its new business travel offering. 
The firm is looking to shake-up the corporate travel sector with a service it claims is “not available elsewhere”. 
The full offering will be available later this year. 
Greg Mannix, head of corporate at LateRooms.com, said, “We’re set to completely raise the bar when it comes to corporate travel management with the launch of LateRooms.com for Business. 
“After building up years of expertise in the corporate travel industry, we know exactly what these customers are looking for. 
“We’re very pleased to be able to provide the next evolution in our service to meet those expectations, streamline the corporate booking experience, and provide very significant cost savings for our clients too.” 
LateRooms.com was put up for sale by current owner Tui Group earlier this year.
